description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help the beautiful babes escape from the obstacles overhead! This release includes holiday-themed HD graphics, intense, cooperative multiplayer, and a few surprises!
